author: Sara Fischer
title: Google to lift advertising ban on coronavirus topics
description: Google will begin to allow some advertisers to run ads across its platforms that address the coronavirus, according to a Google memo sent to clients and obtained by Axios. Why it matters: Democrats have argued that in banning attack ads targeting President Tr…
content:
Google will begin to allow some advertisers to run ads across its platforms that address the coronavirus, according to a Google memo sent to clients and obtained by Axios.
